author: chirino
msg: cleaning up the load client a bit.  better error handling and rate reporting.

author: chirino
msg: Adding a couple more handy MetricProducers

author: chirino
msg: broker is now reblancing connections so that they are grouped.

author: chirino
msg: The Queue now has much more robust prefetch tracking.  This has made consumers/producers much more decoupled. i.e. persisetnce events on one should not aftect the other as much.
the hawtdb store loads messages in batches now.
